data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Some mitochondrial functions are performed only in specific types of cells. For ____, ____ in ____ cells ____ enzymes ____ allow ____ to ____ ammonia, a ____ product ____ protein ____. A mutation in the genes regulating any of these functions can result in mitochondrial diseases.
data.partBlankContent: Some mitochondrial functions are performed only in specific types of cells. For exa____, mitoch______ in li___ cells con____ enzymes th__ allow th__ to deto____ ammonia, a wa___ product o_ protein metab_____. A mutation in the genes regulating any of these functions can result in mitochondrial diseases.
data.answer: 一些线粒体功能仅在特定类型的细胞中发挥。例如，肝细胞内的线粒体含有能使它们解毒氨的酶，氨是蛋白质代谢的废物。调节这些功能的基因发生突变可导致线粒体疾病。
